contentencoded: James Forman, Jr. was born into the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee. His parents were both members of the organization. His father, James Forman, Sr., was SNCC’s executive secretary during the early years of the organization and was one of the freedom movement’s most influential leaders.

title: James Forman, Jr.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

James Forman, Jr. was born into the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee. His parents were both members of the organization. His father, James Forman, Sr., was SNCC’s executive secretary during the early years of the organization and was one of the freedom movement’s most influential leaders.
